articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland commits his future to the club by signing a new long-term deal.
articles.title: Erling Haaland signs new Manchester City deal until 2034

articles.description: Everton will face no further action from Premier League over an outstanding issue relating to a breach of its financial rules.
articles.title: Everton to face no further action over Premier League PSR dispute

articles.description: Ash Gardner leads Australia's dominant day with her maiden international hundred and the 'catch of the century', all in a day's work.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: Ash Gardner plays 'one of the best Ashes innings' and takes 'the catch of the century'

articles.description: Jack Draper shows his monster mentality again to tee up a blockbuster Australian Open meeting with Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Jack Draper beats Aleksandar Vukic & faces Carlos Alcaraz next in Melbourne

articles.description: Be fit, mobile, aggressive and confident - how Emma Raducanu can give herself a chance to beat five-time major champion Iga Swiatek at the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: How Emma Raducanu can attempt to cause a shock against Iga Swiatek

articles.description: NFL MVP contenders Josh Allen and Lamar Jackson have set up a rare play-off match-up, but will Buffalo or Baltimore stay on the road to Super Bowl 59?
articles.title: NFL play-offs: Josh Allen v Lamar Jackson - stats, head-to-head, who is MVP favourite?

articles.description: As Manchester City striker Erling Haaland signs a new contract until 2034, BBC Sport looks at whether he could beat Alan Shearer's Premier League goalscoring record and also get Shearer's thoughts.
articles.title: Erling Haaland: Could Manchester City striker beat Alan Shearer's Premier League record?

articles.description: Ash Gardner's century and Alana King's 5-46 sees England slump to a 3-0 defeat in the ODI leg of the Women's Ashes.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: Ash Gardner and Alana King star as hosts seal ODI clean sweep

articles.description: Naomi Osaka is out of the Australian Open after she was forced to retire injured from her third-round match against Belinda Bencic.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Naomi Osaka retires injured in third-round match against Belinda Bencic

articles.description: Belgium sack head coach Domenico Tedesco after less than two years in charge.
articles.title: Belgium: Domenico Tedesco sacked after just under two years as head coach
